mapper.insert: insert into member(u_name, u_id, u_pw, u_nick, u_tel, u_email, u_address, b_number) values(#{u_name}, #{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_nick}, #{u_tel}, #{u_email}, #{u_address}, #{b_number})
mapper.select: select * from member where u_id=#{u_id} and u_pw=#{u_pw}
mapper.delete: delete from member where u_id = #{u_id} and u_pw = #{u_pw}
